Content.Name: Style Changes
Content.Title: Style Changes
Content.BodyCopy:
This page, if loaded currectly, should showcase the current styles of the school site. In order to test this page with the new style changes, drag the following link to your bookmarks toolbar: New Styles

Now if you click the bookmarklet, the page should update to the new styles. This bookmarklet should work on BYU-Idaho content pages on the live site as well. The "bookmarklet" technique is known to work on Chrome and Internet Explorer, and may have problems in other browsers.

Drag the "New Styles" Link to your Chrome, Safari, or Internet Explorer Bookmarks Bar



Click the Bookmarklet while on a byui.edu page to see the new styles applied.
